Ladies, Begini Cara Bedakan Skincare Natural dan Sintetis
05 Nov 2019, 12:50 by Eka Wahyu Pramita, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Gempuran brand skincare baik lokal maupun impor kian pesat, sementara konsumen di Indonesia pun sudah mulai memiliki kesadaran untuk memilih skincare berbahan natural. Sayangnya, baik skincare natural maupun sintetis sulit dibedakan, tak cukup dilihat dari tekstur atau aromanya.
Brand Manager Sukin Indonesia Riorita Tandyputri mengatakan definisi produk natural jelas hampir sebagian besar bahannya adalah alami. "Perlu diketahui bahwa sintetis buatan manusia sementara natural mengambil ekstrak dari bahan alami," ucapnya dalam peluncuran produk perawatan kulit dari Australia, Sukin, di Jakarta, 5 November 2019.
Lalu bagaimana caranya konsumen membedakan apakah skincare yang digunakan natural atau sintetis? Berikut tips dari Riorita.
1. Aroma
Jika kita menghirup aroma skincare natural kebanyakan tidak terlalu menyengat di indra penciuman, kalau pun ada aroma lebih kuat di herbal. Sementara kalau sintetis kuat di aroma parfum.
"Fragrance ialah senyawa campuran tidak hanya satu, biasanya banyak orang yang alergi karena senyawa tertentu yang tak dijelaskan secara detail seperti apa kandungan yang ada dalam produk. Jadi efek dari senyawa memang beda ke masing-masing orang," ujar Riorita.
2. Tekstur
Jika dicek secara langsung antara skincare natural dengan alami memang nyaris tak ada bedanya. Sama-sama memiliki tekstur yang mirip, baik itu losion, gel, krim, dan liquid.
3. Cek kandungan
Sebenarnya, kata Riorita kita bisa tahu apakah produk skincare yang kita pakai itu dari bahan alami atau tidak bisa dilihat pada label kandungan atau ingredient di awal kita beli. "Kita harus melek informasi untuk mengecek ingredients, cari tahu juga fungsi dan kegunaannya apa, sesuai tidak sama kulit kita," ungkapnya.
4. Pemakaian
Proses mencerahkan kulit menggunakan skincare natural tidak instan, butuh beberapa langkah agar diterima di segala jenis kulit. "Proses natural memang progresnya lebih lama, bisa beberapa bulan dan lebih ke mencerahkan," ucap Riorita.
Sementara kalau sintetis menurutnya lebih cepat efek pemakaiannya kalau cocok dan jika tidak cocok efeknya langsung berasa di kulit bisa breakout atau bruntusan.

Ladies, Here's How to Distinguish Natural and Synthetic Skincare
05 Nov 2019, 12:50 by Eka Wahyu Pramita, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The onslaught of both local and imported skincare brands is growing rapidly, while consumers in Indonesia have begun to have an awareness to choose skincare made from natural. Unfortunately, both natural and synthetic skincare are difficult to distinguish, not enough from the texture or aroma.
Sukin Indonesia's Brand Manager Riorita Tandyputri said that the definition of natural products is clear that most of the ingredients are natural. "Please note that synthetic man-made while natural extracts from natural ingredients," he said in the launch of skin care products from Australia, Sukin, in Jakarta, 5 November 2019.
Then how do consumers differentiate whether skincare used is natural or synthetic? Here are tips from Riorita.
1. Aroma
If we inhale the scent of natural skincare, most are not too overpowering in the sense of smell, even if there is a stronger aroma in herbs. Meanwhile, if synthetic is strong in the scent of perfume.
"Fragrance is not just one compound compound, usually many people are allergic because certain compounds are not explained in detail as to what content is in the product. So the effect of the compound is indeed different for each person," said Riorita.
2. Texture
If checked directly between natural and natural skincare it is almost no difference. Both have a similar texture, be it lotion, gel, cream, and liquid.
3. Check the contents
Actually, said Riorita, we can know whether the skincare products we use are from natural ingredients or cannot be seen on the ingredient label or ingredient at the time of our purchase. "We have to be literate in information to check ingredients, find out what their functions and uses are, not according to our skin," he said.
4. Usage
The process of lightening the skin using natural skincare is not instant, it takes several steps to be accepted in all skin types. "The natural process indeed has a longer progress, can be several months and more enlightening," said Riorita.
Meanwhile, if synthetic according to him the effect is faster if the use is suitable and if it does not match the effect is directly felt on the skin breakout or bruntusan.
